name: Naito Boy
description:
The boy is a knight, so he must move like a knight. Finish each puzzle like a knight, no further instruction needed. 

I've made this game about 5 years ago as final project to one of my course in college with the help two of my friends for level design. This game isn't polished yet, but I plan to make a better work using similar concept.

Let me know what you think about this game. Do you like it? What else more do you want? Any suggestion is welcome on comment below!

Credits

Developed by using awesome libgdx framework.

Character arts by Planet Cute from LostGarden

Background music by McFarland BEATS

Special thanks to my friends Pramono and Kharisma for helping the development of this game.
